attributes.action: Impose tough financial penalties for fabrication of 'fact' in the printed media
attributes.background: With yet another headline in the mainstream tabloids shown to be deliberately misleading and fabricated, the time has come to deter editors from allowing these 'headlines' to be published - especially if they are found to incite hatred and fear of others.

rejection.details:
We think that your petition is similar to the following petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/158505
